verses.verse: Now<WG1161> there was a man<WG444> of the Pharisees,<WG5330> named<WG3686> Nicodemus,<WG3530> a ruler<WG758> of the Jews;<WG2453>

this<WG3778> man<WG3778> came<WG2064> to Him by night,<WG3571> and said<WG3004> to Him, "Rabbi,<WG4461> we know<WG3609> that You have come<WG2064> from God<WG2316> [as] a teacher;<WG1320> for no<WG3762> one<WG3762> can<WG1410> do<WG4160> these<WG3778> signs<WG4592> that You do<WG4160> unless<WG1437> <WG3361> God<WG2316> is with him."

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to him, "Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, unless<WG1437> <WG3361> one<WG5100> is born<WG1080> again,<WG509> he cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> see<WG3708> the kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>"

Nicodemus<WG3530> said<WG3004> to Him, "How<WG4459> can<WG1410> a man<WG444> be born<WG1080> when he is old<WG1088>? He cannot<WG1410> <WG3361> enter<WG1525> a second<WG1208> time<WG1208> into his mother's womb<WG2836> and be born,<WG1080> can he?"

Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, unless<WG1437> <WG3361> one<WG5100> is born<WG1080> of water<WG5204> and the Spirit,<WG4151> he cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> enter<WG1525> into the kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>
"That which is born<WG1080> of the flesh<WG4561> is flesh,<WG4561> and that which is born<WG1080> of the Spirit<WG4151> is spirit<WG4151>.
"Do not marvel<WG2296> that I said<WG3004> to you, 'You must<WG1163> be born<WG1080> again.<WG509>'

" The wind<WG4151> blows<WG4154> where<WG3699> it wishes<WG2309> and you hear<WG191> the sound<WG5456> of it, but do not know<WG3609> where<WG4159> it comes<WG2064> from and where<WG4226> it is going;<WG5217> so<WG3779> is everyone<WG3956> who is born<WG1080> of the Spirit.<WG4151>"
Nicodemus<WG3530> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to Him, "How<WG4459> can<WG1410> these<WG3778> things<WG3778> be?"
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to him, "Are you the teacher<WG1320> of Israel,<WG2474> and do not understand<WG1097> these<WG3778> things<WG3778>?

"Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, we speak<WG2980> that which<WG3739> we know,<WG3609> and bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> of that which<WG3739> we have seen;<WG3708> and you do not receive<WG2983> our witness.<WG3141>
"If<WG1487> I told<WG3004> you earthly<WG1919> things<WG1919> and you do not believe,<WG4100> how<WG4459> shall you believe<WG4100> if<WG1437> I tell<WG3004> you heavenly<WG2032> things<WG2032>?
"And no<WG3762> one<WG3762> has ascended<WG305> into heaven,<WG3772> but He who descended<WG2597> from heaven,<WG3772> [even] the Son<WG5207> of Man.<WG444>
"And as Moses<WG3475> lifted<WG5312> up the serpent<WG3789> in the wilderness,<WG2048> even so<WG3779> must<WG1163> the Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> be lifted<WG5312> up;
that whoever<WG3956> believes<WG4100> may in Him have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>

"For God<WG2316> so<WG3779> loved<WG25> the world,<WG2889> that He gave<WG1325> His only<WG3439> begotten<WG3439> Son,<WG5207> that whoever<WG3956> believes<WG4100> in Him should not perish,<WG622> but have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>
"For God<WG2316> did not send<WG649> the Son<WG5207> into the world<WG2889> to judge<WG2919> the world,<WG2889> but that the world<WG2889> should be saved<WG4982> through<WG1223> Him.

"He who believes<WG4100> in Him is not judged;<WG2919> he who does not believe<WG4100> has been judged<WG2919> already,<WG2235> because<WG3754> he has not believed<WG4100> in the name<WG3686> of the only<WG3439> begotten<WG3439> Son<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

"And this<WG3778> is the judgment,<WG2920> that the light<WG5457> is come<WG2064> into the world,<WG2889> and men<WG444> loved<WG25> the darkness<WG4655> rather<WG3123> than<WG2228> the light;<WG5457> for their deeds<WG2041> were evil.<WG4190>
"For everyone<WG3956> who does<WG4238> evil<WG5337> hates<WG3404> the light,<WG5457> and does not come<WG2064> to the light,<WG5457> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> his deeds<WG2041> should be exposed.<WG1651>
"But he who practices<WG4160> the truth<WG225> comes<WG2064> to the light,<WG5457> that his deeds<WG2041> may be manifested<WG5319> as having been<WG1510> wrought<WG2038> in God.<WG2316>"

After<WG3326> these<WG3778> things<WG3778> Jesus<WG2424> and His disciples<WG3101> came<WG2064> into the land<WG1093> of Judea,<WG2453> and there<WG1563> He was spending<WG1304> time<WG1304> with them and baptizing.<WG907>

And John<WG2491> also<WG2532> was baptizing<WG907> in Aenon<WG137> near<WG1451> Salim,<WG4530> because<WG3754> there was much<WG4183> water<WG5204> there;<WG1563> and they were coming<WG3854> and were being baptized.<WG907>
For John<WG2491> had not yet<WG3768> been<WG1510> thrown<WG906> into prison.<WG5438>
There arose<WG1096> therefore<WG3767> a discussion<WG2214> on the part of John's disciples<WG3101> with a Jew<WG2453> about<WG4012> purification.<WG2512>

And they came<WG2064> to John<WG2491> and said<WG3004> to him, "Rabbi,<WG4461> He who<WG3739> was with you beyond<WG4008> the Jordan,<WG2446> to whom<WG3739> you have borne<WG3140> witness,<WG3140> behold,<WG2396> He is baptizing,<WG907> and all<WG3956> are coming<WG2064> to Him."
John<WG2491> answered<WG611> and said,<WG3004> "A man<WG444> can<WG1410> receive<WG2983> nothing,<WG3756> <WG3762> unless<WG1437> <WG3361> it has been<WG1510> given<WG1325> him from heaven.<WG3772>
"You yourselves<WG846> bear<WG3140> me witness,<WG3140> that I said,<WG3004> 'I am<WG1510> not the Christ,<WG5547>' but, 'I have been<WG1510> sent<WG649> before<WG1715> Him.'

"He who has<WG2192> the bride<WG3565> is the bridegroom;<WG3566> but the friend<WG5384> of the bridegroom,<WG3566> who stands<WG2476> and hears<WG191> him, rejoices<WG5463> greatly<WG5479> because<WG1223> of the bridegroom's voice.<WG5456> And so<WG3767> this<WG3778> joy<WG5479> of mine<WG1699> has been made<WG4137> full.<WG4137>
"He must<WG1163> increase,<WG837> but I must decrease.<WG1642>

"He who comes<WG2064> from above<WG509> is above<WG1883> all,<WG3956> he who is of the earth<WG1093> is from the earth<WG1093> and speaks<WG2980> of the earth.<WG1093> He who comes<WG2064> from heaven<WG3772> is above<WG1883> all.<WG3956>
"What<WG3739> He has seen<WG3708> and heard,<WG191> of that He bears<WG3140> witness;<WG3140> and no<WG3762> man<WG3762> receives<WG2983> His witness.<WG3141>
"He who has received<WG2983> His witness<WG3141> has set<WG4972> his seal<WG4972> to [this,] that God<WG2316> is true.<WG227>
"For He whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> has sent<WG649> speaks<WG2980> the words<WG4487> of God;<WG2316> for He gives<WG1325> the Spirit<WG4151> without<WG3756> <WG1537> measure.<WG3358>
"The Father<WG3962> loves<WG25> the Son,<WG5207> and has given<WG1325> all<WG3956> things<WG3956> into His hand.<WG5495>

"He who believes<WG4100> in the Son<WG5207> has<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life;<WG2222> but he who does not obey<WG544> the Son<WG5207> shall not see<WG3708> life,<WG2222> but the wrath<WG3709> of God<WG2316> abides<WG3306> on him."
